name: MapMap
description: MapMap is a mobile application that allows you to map routes that travel on public transport vehicles in a city, with the aim of generating data in GTFS format.

SDGs.evidenceText: Currently one of the greatest challenges presented by cities of Latin American countries is that of the urban mobility, in a large percentage public transport provided through concessions through the sector private, this could imply a lack of knowledge of the number of concessions passing through the cities, the itineraries that tend to be irregular, as well as the routes where they circulate are unknown
